#define MMW_NUM_ANGLE_BINS   64
 Azimuth FFT size.
 
#define MMWDEMO_AZIMUTH_TWO_PEAK_DETECTION_ENABLE   1
 Flag to enable/disable two peak detection in azimuth for same range and velocity.
 
#define MMWDEMO_AZIMUTH_TWO_PEAK_THRESHOLD_SCALE   (0.5)
 Threshold for two peak detection in azimuth for same range and velocity, if 2nd peak heigth > first peak height * this scale then declare 2nd peak as detected.

Detailed Description

This is the data path processing header.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define MMW_HWA_NUM_MEM_BUFS   4

Partiion HWA memory into 4 equal parts - M0,M1,M2,M3.

#define MMW_WIN_BLACKMAN   1

Blackman window

#define MMW_WIN_HANNING   0

Hanning window

#define MMW_WIN_RECT   2

Rectangular window

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum DataPath_chain2DFftSel_e DataPath_chain2DFftSel

Data path chain selection.

This enum defines the data path chain selection options for 2D FFT

typedef struct MmwDemo_dataPathCQ_t MmwDemo_dataPathCQ

Millimeter Wave Demo Data Path CQ configuration.

The structure is used to hold all the relevant information for the data path CQ.

typedef struct MmwDemo_DataPathObj_t MmwDemo_DataPathObj

Millimeter Wave Demo Data Path Information.

The structure is used to hold all the relevant information for the data path.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DataPath_chain2DFftSel_e

Data path chain selection.

This enum defines the data path chain selection options for 2D FFT

Enumerator
DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG 

Data path chain that runs separate 2D FFT and Log-mag Calcuation in the HWA.

DATA_PATH_CHAIN_COMBINED_LOGMAG 

Data path chain that runs log-mag together with 2D FFT in the HWA.

enum DataPath_mode

Data path mode.

This enum defines if the data path chain is running standalone (such as in a unit test) or if it is running as part of a demo (integrated with ADC buffer)

Enumerator
DATA_PATH_STANDALONE 

Data path running standalone

DATA_PATH_WITH_ADCBUF 

Data path integrated with ADC buffer

void MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCommon ( MmwDemo_DataPathObj *  obj)

Description
Common configuration of data path processing, required to be done only once. Configures all of EDMA and window RAM of HWA.

Parameters
[in]objPointer to data path obj.
Return values
none.
void MmwDemo_dataPathDeleteSemaphore ( MmwDemo_DataPathObj *  obj)

Description
Delete semaphores.

void MmwDemo_dataPathObjInit ( MmwDemo_DataPathObj *  obj,
MmwDemo_CliCfg_t *  cliCfg,
MmwDemo_CliCommonCfg_t *  cliCommonCfg 
)

Description
Initializes data path object with supplied cli config pointer. The cli config points to permanent storage outside of data path object that data path object can refer to anytime during the lifetime of data path object. Data path default values that are not required to come through CLI commands are also set in this function.

void MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger1D ( MmwDemo_DataPathObj *  obj)

Description

Parameters

Return values
none.

Return values

void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn ( EDMA_Handle  handle,
EDMA_errorInfo_t *  errorInfo 
)

Description
Call back function for EDMA CC (Channel controller) error as per EDMA API. Declare fatal error if happens, the output errorInfo can be examined if code gets trapped here.

Description

uint8_t* MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc ( MmwDemoMemPool_t *  pool,
uint32_t  size 
)

Description
Utility function for allocating from a static memory pool.

Precondition
It is assumed that no allocation from l3 will need better than 32-bit alignment (structures with 64-bit prohibited) and so for simplicity, size is assumed to be multiple of 4 bytes
Parameters
[in]poolHandle to pool structure.
[in]sizeSize in bytes to be allocated.
Return values
pointerto beginning of allocated block. NULL indicates could notice allocate.
void MmwDemo_memPoolReset ( MmwDemoMemPool_t *  pool)

Description
Utility function for reseting memory pool.

Parameters
[in]poolHandle to pool structure.
Return values
none.
